{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import math
{% endraw %}

This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

Exporting

Exporting cells is done by adding a comment at the top like this:

{% raw %} 
def sum_up_to(n):
    return int(n*(n+1)/2)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sum_up_to(10)

55
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def product_up_to(n):
    return math.factorial(n)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
product_up_to(6)

720
{% endraw %}
